manifest.title: Snipe-IT
manifest.author: Snipe-IT Authors
manifest.description:
## About

Snipe-IT is a FOSS project for asset management in IT Operations. Knowing who has which laptop, when
it was purchased in order to depreciate it correctly, handling software licenses, etc.

## Features

* Open Source - Snipe-IT is open source software. Transparency, security and oversight is at the heart of everything we do. No vendor lock-in again, ever.

* App & Platform Security - Both Snipe-IT as a software product and our cloud-hosting infrastructure were designed with security at the forefront.

* Frequent Updates - Snipe-IT is improved constantly, with new releases every few weeks. Bug-fixes and new features ship daily.

* Powerful REST API - Our simple and intuitive developer JSON REST API allows you to develop custom automations based on your own individual needs.

change-default-password.message: Change the admin email and password immediately.

manifest.changelog:
* Update snipe-it to 8.3.7
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/releases/tag/v8.3.7)
* Add new 'git remote' management to change Snipe-IT URLs by [@uberbrady](https://github.com/uberbrady) in [#18245](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18245)  
* Fixes [FD-52064] Avery `L6009_A` & `L4736_A` label field overflow with scaling by [@Godmartinz](https://github.com/Godmartinz) in [#18246](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18246)  
* Optimize queries for Components listing by [@uberbrady](https://github.com/uberbrady) in [#18251](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18251)  
* Added endpoint & use\_path\_style\_endpoint configs for public/private S3 by [@Valinwolf](https://github.com/Valinwolf) in [#18266](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18266)  
* Experiment: simpler light/dark toggle by [@snipe](https://github.com/snipe) in [#18249](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18249)  
* Refactor `assignee` in Checkoutable to accept null by [@Godmartinz](https://github.com/Godmartinz) in [#18273](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18273)  
* Check That Email Exists on Recipient in Checkout Acceptance by [@spencerrlongg](https://github.com/spencerrlongg) in [#18274](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18274)  
* Fixed [#18160](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/issues/18160) - Multi-create validation fixes by [@uberbrady](https://github.com/uberbrady) in [#18247](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18247)  
* Fixes Manager View not displaying subordinates EULAs properly in View Assets page by [@iryadifarhan](https://github.com/iryadifarhan) in [#18257](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18257)  
* adds [#17422](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/issues/17422) [FD-49345] `--expired-licenses` command parameter to `snipeit:expiring-alerts` by [@Godmartinz](https://github.com/Godmartinz) in [#18244](https://github.com/grokability/snipe-it/pull/18244)
